subject: Re: [junit] Hamcrest 1.2 released
msgSnippet: Hey!  It s our first to-do on GitHub: http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/#issue/1 Thanks, David Saff
messageBody:
Hey! It's our first to-do on GitHub:

http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/#issue/1

Thanks,

David Saff

On Fri, May 22, 2009 at 7:15 AM, Steve Freeman <smgfreeman@...> wrote:
> I've taken the trouble to actually release Hamcrest 1.2, now with
> mismatch reporting.
>
> For now, to get the full reporting you have to make sure that you use
> the Hamcrest features from the Hamcrest jar, rather than the ones
> included with JUnit (so use the no-dependencies version). In
> particular, make sure you use the right assertThat() to get the full
> benefit. We hope we can get this fixed soon.
>
> S.
>
>
> Steve Freeman
> Winner of the Agile Alliance Gordon Pask award 2006
